meanings.definition: To visit multiple bars in succession.
meanings.sent1: Last night, we barhopped from one pub to another, trying different cocktails at each stop.
meanings.sent2: She barhopped with her friends on her birthday, enjoying the lively atmosphere of each bar.
meanings.sent3: The group of friends decided to barhop their way through the city, ending up at a karaoke bar.
meanings.sent4: After barhopping for hours, they finally found the perfect spot with live music and great drinks.
meanings.sent5: Barhopping through the city streets, they discovered hidden gems and new favorite hangout spots.

meanings.definition: The act of moving from one bar to another in search of drinks or entertainment.
meanings.sent1: Barhopped can be a fun way to explore different nightlife options in the city.
meanings.sent2: The barhopped of the group always knew the best places to go for a night out.
meanings.sent3: During the barhopped, they stumbled upon a comedy club and decided to stay for a show.
meanings.sent4: The barhopped led them to a rooftop bar with stunning views of the city skyline.
meanings.sent5: With each barhopped, they collected memories and stories to share later.
